text:
Han Grijzenhout (22 December 1932 – 18 December 2020) was a Dutch football manager. He was born in Amsterdam. He managed Cercle Brugge K.S.V. from 1972 to 1977, 1982 to 1983 and 1988 to 1991. He also managed K.A.A. Gent from 1980 to 1981 and from 1984 to 1987.
Grijzenhout died on 18 December 2020 in Ghent, Belgium, aged 87.
